alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 3:35PM EST until November 22 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch for a storm total of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Northern, North Woods, and Penobscot Valley Maine * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute and those with holiday travel plans.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis
